examples.example: 今天的天气真好，是的，这是一个适合出游的好日子。

translate.english: Today's weather is really good. Yes, this is a good day suitable for traveling.

examples.example: 遇到困难不要气馁，是的，要相信自己一定能够克服它。

translate.english: Don't be discouraged when encountering difficulties. Yes, believe that you can definitely overcome it.

examples.example: 无论遇到什么情况，我们都要保持乐观，是的，这样生活才会充满阳光。

translate.english: No matter what situation we encounter, we should remain optimistic. Yes, only in this way can life be full of sunshine.
